A decade or so ago, economists saw Ethiopia as Africaâ€™s best hope of replicating the exportÂ­-led growth of Asian states like Vietnam or Bangladesh. The countryâ€™s prime minister, Abiy Ahmed, is dreaming of Dubai.

The reality is far less glittering https://t.co/DoNvzznS7B ğŸ‘‡
